```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv(file = './HDC data/TTE_stroke.csv', na.string = c("-","","#N/A","NA"))
```

```{r}

```


```{r}
raw_data$birth <- as.Date(raw_data$birth, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
raw_data$date_serv <- as.Date(raw_data$date_serv, format = "%Y-%m-%d")

str(raw_data)
```

```{r}
raw_data$diff_dates = difftime(raw_data$birth,raw_data$date_serv, units = "days")
```


